title: Solar PV key to transforming water, energy, food crises into a nexus opportunity - pv magazine International
summary: The article discusses how integrated policy actions considering the intersection of energy, water, and food can create opportunities to reduce risk and achieve long-term emissions target reductions. It highlights the potential of solar PV (photovoltaic) technologies like desalination, agrivoltaics, and solar irrigation to address water scarcity, increase food security, and support a green and inclusive transition. The article emphasizes the importance of political commitment and collaboration to scale up investments in clean energy technologies and accelerate Africa's just energy transition.

title: TS Conductor Wins Rising Star Company at S&P Global Commodity Insights' 25th Annual Platts Global Energy Awards - PR Web
summary: TS Conductor has developed advanced conductors that can transport three times the electricity with only half the line losses and minimal sag when compared to conventional conductors. This technology can be easily installed using the same tools and techniques that line crews have been utilizing for decades, making it applicable to both new construction and reconductoring projects. TS' solutions play a pivotal role in accelerating grid decarbonization by facilitating increased connectivity for renewable generation and mitigating current interconnection bottlenecks.
